change.changenote: Section 1.1 was enacted by BC Reg 157/2015, effective July 28, 2015.
Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 242/2013, effective November 28, 2013.

section.sectiontext: The disputant must serve the authority with a copy of the filed documents by

paragraph.paragraphtext: leaving them with a receptionist at, or
mailing them by registered mail to

section.secsandwich: the authority's head office at 287 Nelson's Court, New Westminster, BC, V3L 0E7.

change.changenote: Section 12 (1) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 242/2013, effective November 28, 2013.

subsection.subsectiontext: Rules 8 (4) and (6), 10 (1), (2) and (11) to (13), 15 (1) and (2), 16 (2) (c.1), (3) to (5), (6) (a), (d) and (k.1) to (o), (7) to (11), 17 (4), (6), (7), (9) to (17) and (20), 18 (16) and (17) (a), 19, 21 (2) and 22 of the Small Claims Rules apply to a dispute referred to in this regulation.
